meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a covenant.
meanings.sent1: The covenantal agreement was signed by both parties.
meanings.sent2: Their relationship was built on a covenantal promise.
meanings.sent3: The covenantal bond between them was unbreakable.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as covenantal as a sacred vow.
meanings.sent5: The covenantal connection between them was deeply meaningful.

meanings.definition: Involving or based on a covenant.
meanings.sent1: The covenantal ceremony was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent2: Their decision was covenantal and binding.
meanings.sent3: The covenantal celebration lasted all night.
meanings.sent4: Their commitment was as covenantal as a marriage vow.
meanings.sent5: The covenantal promise was kept through thick and thin.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to a covenant.
meanings.sent1: The covenantal document outlined their responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: Their actions were covenantal in nature.
meanings.sent3: The covenantal terms were clear and fair.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as covenantal as a legal agreement.
meanings.sent5: The covenantal relationship was based on trust and respect.
